# JOKSU Voting System - Jagannath University

## Project Overview
This is a mobile voting application for JOKSU (Jagannath University Kendrio Chhatra Sangsad) elections built with React Native and Expo.

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo
- TypeScript
- React Navigation for routing
- Context API for state management
- AsyncStorage for local data persistence

## Project Structure
- `/src/screens` - App screens (Login, Home, Voting, Results, Admin)
- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/context` - React Context providers
- `/src/types` - TypeScript type definitions
- `/src/data` - Mock data for candidates and positions
- `/src/utils` - Utility functions

## Features
- Student ID authentication
- Candidate listing by positions (VP, GS, AGS, etc.)
- Secure voting mechanism
- Real-time results display
- Admin panel for election management

## Running the App
```bash
npx expo start
```
